Package query

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Query
    The goal is to transform a user query (XML, JSON...) into a valid SPARQL QueryString
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventInXMLfile
    This class represents an event described in a user query (send via a XMLfile).
    Results  
    XMLFile
    This class handles a XML file containing the query.
    XMLQuery
    A class returning a query string for a SPARQL query The initial query is a XML file handled by XMLFile.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    XMLFile.XMLattributes
    An enumeration of XML attributes in the XML file containing the query number : the number of the event
    XMLFile.XMLelement
    An enumeration of XML elements in the XML file containing the query event : describes one event we want link : the link between 2 events minValue : minimum value of a predicate (must be numeric or date) maxValue : maximum value of a predicate (must be numeric or date) value : one value of a factor type (instance of a terminology) predicateType : a predicate name eventType : an event type event1 : for link only, the number of the first event event2 : for link only, the number of the second event predicate1 : for link only, the predicate name of the first event predicate1 : for link only, the predicate name of the second event operator : for link only, the name of the operator to compare values
    XMLFile.XMLoperator
    An enumeration of authorized operations to compare values diff : difference between values
    XMLFile.XMLvariableType
    An enumeration of VariableType in the XML file containing the query numeric : is a numeric datatype factor : is an instance of a terminology (ex : ICD-10 code) date : is a date value datatype
